vv50:9.4: agañchiṁ → gacchiṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli2); āgacchiṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); agacchiṁ (pts-vp-pli1) | udahāriyā → udakahāriyā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
vv50:10.4: attho → kīvatthopi (sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); kvatthopi (sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); kvatthosi (mr)
vv50:20.3: Dukkha → ayaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2) | nirodho maggo ca → dukkhanirodho ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
